column1: sqlcmd -S localhost -d master -Q "SELECT name FROM sys.databases"
sqlcmd -S dbserver -d CustomerDB -Q "SELECT TOP 10 * FROM Customers"
sqlcmd -S dbserver -d CustomerDB -Q "SELECT SSN, CreditCardNumber FROM FinancialRecords" -o C:\temp\db_dump.txt
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="AllowOutboundFTP" dir=out action=allow protocol=TCP localport=21
netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="AllowOutboundHTTP" dir=out action=allow protocol=TCP localport=80
fsutil file createnew C:\temp\dummy_file.dat 104857600 && del C:\temp\dummy_file.dat
